sentences.english: Light the degree of coloring for object is called color rendering.
sentences.chinese: 光源对于物体颜色呈现的程度称为显色性。

sentences.english: Want to use auxiliary illuminant to build atmosphere additionally.
sentences.chinese: 另外要利用辅助光源营造气氛。

sentences.english: The effects of the parameters of RF system to electron beam intensity in Hefei storage ring are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了合肥光源高频系统参数对束流流强的影响。

sentences.english: The method of first selection is compensatory population illuminant .
sentences.chinese: 首选的办法是补充人口光源。

sentences.english: At the moment, only the polygons pointed towards the light source will be lit.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的场景里，只有朝向光源的多边形是被照亮的。

sentences.english: Each cilium terminates within the Pavilion - with another tiny light source.
sentences.chinese: 每个纤毛终亭与另一极光源。
灯源是18W和36W的飞利浦光源。

sentences.english: This article reviewed the progress of solid state sources catch up with florescent lamps.
sentences.chinese: 综述近三年来固态光源追赶荧光灯的进展。

sentences.english: The point light sources are set on the light incident surface.
sentences.chinese: 该多个点光源设置于该导光板光入射面。

sentences.english: Experiment analysis of correlated color temperature and distribution temperature of the source;
sentences.chinese: 颜色温度和相关色温是光源的重要参量。

sentences.english: I adjusted the shade so the lamp would shine its light out the window onto the cherry blossoms, turning them almost white.
sentences.chinese: 被我折了方向的灯翼，光源投往窗外照白半树枝樱花。

sentences.english: Spectral sample data is supported, allowing a selection of illuminants and observer types.
sentences.chinese: 光谱采样数据也被支持，允许选择光源和观察器类型。

sentences.english: The radiation was filtered either by borosilicate glass or by quartz .
sentences.chinese: 辐射光源或用硼硅酸盐玻璃或用石英过滤。

sentences.english: This paper presented some thoughts on potential application of SSRF on virology-related studies.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出了同步光源在病毒学研究中应用的一些想法。

sentences.english: The main function is to guide the spot light source of LED to plane light source.
sentences.chinese: 导光板主要功能是引导LED的点光源成为平面光源。

sentences.english: The main function is to guide the spot light source of LED to plane light source.
sentences.chinese: 导光板主要功能是引导LED的点光源成为平面光源。
